You basically write out questions abt the topic and test yourself. Then without reading the notes go answer all and check back the notes. See where u got it wrong. Repeat this everyday or every 2 days. Its scientifically proven that Memorising or Underlining notes does not help u memorise efficiently. So use active recall for better results.
